programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E16, A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.
MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

programme.title: The Rebel Set
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Rebel Set, S04E19, Three coffee shop customers help an owner rob an armored car.

programme.title: City Limits
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: City Limits, S04E03, Set in the future, a teenage gang battles a corporation for control of an abandoned city in City Limits (1984). Crow sings a song devoted to Kim Cattrall and the guys try their hand at a City Limits trivia game.

programme.title: Future War
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E04, Future War was the most recent film ridiculed by the Satellite of Love crew, proving once and for all that movies aren’t always turned bad by age.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. Abby finds out the truth about the fraud investigation from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Deals Undone
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Mick faces a failing business deal while Abby is subpoenaed.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20170730000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.
Window Wonderland, 20131123000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.
The National Tree, 20091128000000 +0000, A man (Andrew McCarthy) and his son (Evan Williams) embark on a cross-country road trip to transport a Christmas tree to Washington, D.C.
Return to Christmas Creek, 20181117000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Amelia returns to Christmas Creek to rediscover family at Christmas.
Northpole, 20141115000000 +0000, When a loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the existence of Santa's Northpole, a little boy named Kevin is called upon to save the day.

The Valley of Light, 20060131000000 +0000, A World War II veteran returns home in search of a place to belong. Stars Chris Klein, Gretchen Mol, Zach Mills, Jay O. Sanders, Jeff Perry, Geoff Pierson, Stephen Tobolowsky and Robert Prosky. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

To Dance with the White Dog, 19931205000000 +0000, An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Bounty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E15, After Netan (Eric Steinberg), and the Lucian Alliance, are undermined by SG-1 yet again, he decides to put a bounty out on their heads. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Bad Guys
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E16, Mistaken for rebels on an alien planet, SG-1 must play the part of hostage takers in hopes to buy themselves enough time to be rescued before they're executed. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Talion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E17, Barely surviving the bombing massacre of a peaceful Jaffa summit, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) must go rogue to track down and stop a Jaffa leader named Arkad (Craig Fairbrass) who plans to take control of the Jaffa nation and deliver them to the Ori.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E18, Vala's (Claudia Black) father Jacek (guest star Fred Willard) contacts Stargate Command wishing to trade information about a series of planned attacks on Earth in exchange for sanctuary on the planet. Also starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Dominion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E19, In an elaborate plan using Vala Mal Doran (Claudia Black) as bait to capture Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin), SG-1 themselves are surprised when Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) intercepts Adria from under them to use in his own evil plan.

programme.title: Unending
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E20, With extinction imminent, the Asgard hand over all their knowledge and technology to SG-1, but not before the Ori launch an attack trying to intercede. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Children Of The Gods (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E01, As Colonel Jack O'Neill and his team journey to Abydos to confront deadly warriors and laser-firing Death Gliders, O'Neill realizes that this new mission seems hauntingly familiar and that an old enemy has returned to take his revenge on Earth.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E03, In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Emancipation
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E04, On the planet Simarka, where the fierce race of Shavadai mistreat females, Capt. Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) challenges their ways in a thrilling battle of wits that may bring women equity or forever keep them as second-class citizens.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.title: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E12, Dissatisfied customers take Steve to court, and wind up on TV; Gina continues to care for Dylan, who is arrested; Donna and Noah struggle to find a place to be alone; David has to back up his lie to Gertrude; Kelly second-guesses herself with Matt.

programme.title: Beheading St. Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E15, Lauren moves into the Walsh house; Steve's idea for his paper leads to an alert about a potential health problem; Donna agrees to pose as David's girlfriend at a business function; Gina worries she can't keep pace with Dylan.

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: 80's Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E06, David's radio persona gets flack-and ratings; Matt tries to overturn a death sentence for a rapist-murderer; the after-hours club attracts the wrong attention; Steve haunts the house.

programme.title: Baby, You Can Drive My Car
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E08, Janet begins to panic about wedding preparations. Steve suggests that they organize a scavenger hunt for their friends, with clues providing the location of a party. Gina freaks out when Dylan refuses to pull over and help a stray dog.

programme.title: Family Tree
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E09, Steve and Janet endure various calamaties on their honeymoon. Just as they are beginning to have a good time, Janet goes into labor. Jackie seeks full custody of Erin, and David and Kelly try to keep their sister's spirits up.

programme.title: Nine Yolks Whipped Lightly
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E12, Gina's meeting with her father is unsatisfying, similar to Janet and her parents; Donna can't let go of Noah's accident; Dylan loses control in front of kids, and has second thoughts about Kelly, but is too late.

Taken From Me: The Tiffany Rubin Story, 20250721192800 +0000, Schoolteacher Tiffany Rubin (Taraji P. Henson) flies to South Korea to reunite with her 7-year-old son (Drew Davis), who was kidnapped by his biological father.
Beyond the Headlines: The Tiffany Rubin Story, 20250721210900 +0000, A woman learns that her child was kidnapped by his father and taken to South Korea.

Girl in the Shed: The Kidnapping of Abby Hernandez, 20250721220000 +0000, Fourteen-year-old Abby Hernandez vanishes while walking home from school in North Conway, N.H. programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E22, A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a rescue on the Baywatch beach and realizes that a television series based on lifeguarding is perfect, sending Baywatch headquarters into a tizzy.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E01, After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch to place an underwater seismometer in the Malibu fault. Hobie has an argument with his father about his future.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E02, Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake! Hobie's and Jackie's lives hang in the balance. It is up to the Baywatch team to save them before it's too late!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E03, After a recent earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother in Ohio. When they both show up at headquarters a few weeks later Mitch is surprised, especially when he hears the reason they are there.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E04, John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E05, Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E06, Carter McKay has recently moved to Southern California to live with his father after his mother's death. When Hobie invites him to the annual father/son lifeguard competition Hobie learns the reason Carter is so embarrassed by his father.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over Your
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E07, When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E08, The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E09, When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E10, Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.
